required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy Study of Enzalutamide in Patients With Nonmetastatic Castration-Resistant Prostate Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: Prosper: A Multinational, Phase 3, Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Efficacy And Safety Study Of Enzalutamide In Patients With Nonmetastatic Castration-resistant Prostate Cancer

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to assess the safety and efficacy of enzalutamide in patients with non metastatic prostate cancer.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to First Use of New Antineoplastic Therapy
Time to First Use of Cytotoxic Chemotherapy
Quality of Life as assessed by EQ-5D-5L and QLQ-PR25
Time to chemotherapy-free disease specific survival

Safety as assessed by percentage of patients with any Adverse Event (AE), AE leading to Study Drug Discontinuation, AE leading to death, Serious Adverse Event (SAE), AE related to study drug, SAE related to study drug

arm_group.description: Sugar pill manufactured to mimic enzalutamide 40 mg capsule
